CardData.FlavorText:
<line-height=100%><size=200%>Y</size>ou move with an abundance of caution toward the tower. Senses stretched to their utmost, you scrutinize every shadow for hidden dangers with each step you take.
<indent=50></indent>Your caution serves you wellâ€”you spot a cluster of orcs in time for your party to adjust its approach. Directing your companions with silent gestures, you slip around to attack the orcs from behind.
